author: andreasmyth
msg: Logged a warning instead of throwing a ConfigurationException when the bean factory cannot be created because a class specified for one of the beans cannot be found, or because the bean definitions file contains syntax errors.
The application continues using default values for all configurable properties.
Improved error handling when a trying using elements in bean definition files that cannot be bound by JAXB (previously this resulted only in a NullPointerException, now in a ConfigurationException).

author: cjodea
msg: updated README with more information on configuring a Handler Chain using an external JAXB bindings customisation.
